p: After IVM culture, 8‒10 COCs were co-incubated with frozen-thawed sperm (1 × 10 6 sperm/m l) in 100- µl drops of HTF medium (Nippon Medical & Chemical Instruments Co., Ltd.) supplemented with 0.3% BSA (Sigma-Aldrich Corp.), covered with mineral oil, and incubated for 12 hr at 38.5°C in a humidified atmosphere with 5% CO 2.
